item.title: In need of HELP
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“Veng4lyfe, post:1, topic:324894”]Hello everyone, I have just added something to my server, but it appears to be giving me one error -.- If someone can help me I will be greatful

here is the error code i get.

client.java :15772: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable  PutNpcCords
location: class client
                 PutNpcCord = true;
                 ^

And I will list what I’m trying to add. I’m using pk jads source which I’m pretty sure is delta

[QUOTE=Fubergen;2883]
How it works

difficulty: 1/10

[SIZE=“2”]
In game, you talk with tramp, in this case, ramp’s id is 641. Only donators can use and you must not wear anything or then it wont work. This will protect people, that keeps items in equipment, that couldn’t be possible after reset.

  • Cheat client protect, eg, if someone tries stat reset by interface (2808), it wont work, because it still reguires the things, that i told in interface.

To remove only donator can use, then remove donator parts.[/SIZE]

o0ti5i.png766×503

Thanks dan

in client.java

add this to case 155 and then find similar coder and add

if(NPCID == 641 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == -1 && donator == 1) { PutNPCCoords = true; showInterface(2808); } else if(NPCID == 641 && donator == 0) { sM("Take your armour off before reset and now you need to be Donator also!"); }

in clickingmost.java

[CODE]case 10255:
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerLegs] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerChest] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == -1 && c.donator == 1){
c.playerLevel[6] = 1;
(c.playerXP[6]) = 0;
c.savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;

                                            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                            c.updateRequired = true;
                                            c.closeInterface();

}
else if(c.donator == 0)
{
c.sM(“Take your armour off before reset and now you need to be Donator also!”);
}

                                           break;

                                    case 10252:

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerLegs] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerChest] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == -1 && c.donator == 1){

item.title: In need of HELP
item.dc:creator: @Veng4lyfe Veng4lyfe
item.description:
@Veng4lyfe wrote:

Hello everyone, I have just added something to my server, but it appears to be giving me one error -.- If someone can help me I will be greatful

here is the error code i get.

client.java :15772: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable  PutNpcCords
location: class client
                 PutNpcCord = true;
                 ^

And I will list what I’m trying to add. I’m using pk jads source which I’m pretty sure is delta

[QUOTE=Fubergen;2883]
How it works

difficulty: 1/10

[SIZE=“2”]
In game, you talk with tramp, in this case, ramp’s id is 641. Only donators can use and you must not wear anything or then it wont work. This will protect people, that keeps items in equipment, that couldn’t be possible after reset.

  • Cheat client protect, eg, if someone tries stat reset by interface (2808), it wont work, because it still reguires the things, that i told in interface.

To remove only donator can use, then remove donator parts.[/SIZE]

o0ti5i.png766×503

Thanks dan

in client.java

add this to case 155 and then find similar coder and add

if(NPCID == 641 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerCape] == -1 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == -1 && donator == 1) { PutNPCCoords = true; showInterface(2808); } else if(NPCID == 641 && donator == 0) { sM("Take your armour off before reset and now you need to be Donator also!"); }

in clickingmost.java

[CODE]case 10255:
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerLegs] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerChest] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == -1 && c.donator == 1){
c.playerLevel[6] = 1;
(c.playerXP[6]) = 0;
c.savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;

                                            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerLegs] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerChest] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == -1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == -1 && c.donator == 1){
